pages.text: The Fluid Cell can be used to store and distribute fluids. The fluid cell starts with 32,000mb of capacity and 8,000mb/t max in/out rate, which can be improved using augments. It can only store one fluid at a time. Each side can be configured to in/output, and the cell can be configured to auto-input/output. Provides a comparator output proportional to how full it is.

The transfer rate of the fluid cell can be precisely configured. In the GUI, on both sides of the fluid gauge, are the input and output transfer rates. These can be set manually using the '+' and '-' buttons in order to precisely control the rate of fluid transfer. Left/right clicking will change the rate by 50/10 mb per tick. Ctrl-clicking changes the rate by 5/1. Shift-clicking will instead change the rate by 1000/100. Ctrl-shift-clicking changes the rate by 10k/1k.

The Fluid cell can be right clicked with buckets to fill or empty it one bucket at a time. Beware that there is currently a bug with Forge where trying to bucket a nonbucketable fluid voids your bucket!
